definition: to startle/to be frightened/to be scared/alarm
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: The startled horse charged about blindly, upsetting a row of ped1ars' stalls AT the side of the street.
sentences.chinese: 那匹驚馬一個勁亂跑，把街旁一排小販的貨攤撞翻了。

sentences.english: The rider calmed the frightened horse.
